title: bsc testnet sync stopped after bsc Gibbs hardfork
body:
erigon version: 2022.09.1-alpha
script:
```
./bin/erigon \
        --datadir=./data \
        --chain=chapel \
        --http.addr=0.0.0.0 \
        --http.port=8545 \
        --http.corsdomain=* \
        --ws \
        --http.vhosts=* \
        --http.api=eth,net,trace,web3,erigon \
        --torrent.download.rate 100mb 
```
After hardfork logs:

Does 2022.09.1-alpha erigon support bsc gibbs hardfork?
https://github.com/bnb-chain/bsc/releases/tag/v1.1.13
I tested 2022.09.1-alpha and it seems, this version does not work as well.
